meanings.sent1: The rock was incompressible, no matter how hard I tried to squish it.
meanings.sent2: The foam material used in the packaging is incompressible to protect fragile items.
meanings.sent3: I joked that my backpack was incompressible because I couldn't fit anything else in it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an incompressible force, impossible to diminish.
meanings.sent5: The steel beams were as incompressible as a solid wall, unyielding to pressure.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being squeezed into a smaller space.
meanings.sent1: The balloon was incompressible, refusing to shrink no matter how much I pushed.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase was incompressible, making it difficult to fit in the overhead compartment.
meanings.sent3: I found it funny how my cat acted incompressible when I tried to put her in a small box.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness was like an incompressible block, impossible to change.
meanings.sent5: The memory foam pillow was as incompressible as a brick, providing firm support.

meanings.definition: Resistant to being reduced in volume.
meanings.sent1: The air mattress was incompressible, staying full and firm all night.
meanings.sent2: The sponge was incompressible, always returning to its original size after squeezing.
meanings.sent3: I playfully called my friend incompressible because he never budged on his opinions.
meanings.sent4: Her love for animals was like an incompressible spring, always bouncing back.
meanings.sent5: The gel material was as incompressible as a solid block, maintaining its shape under pressure.
